channel.title: CVE Feed for easyii -- CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for easyii -- CMS

item.title: CVE-2022-3771|2024-08-03T01:20:58.223Z -- easyii -- cms
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in easyii CMS. This issue affects the function file of the file helpers/Upload.php of the component File Upload Management. The manipulation leads to unrestricted upload. The attack may be initiated remotely. The identifier VDB-212501 was assigned to this vulnerability.
